project.component:
{:repl-history {:ide [], :local ["(let [width 400
 height 400
 points (atom (mapv (fn [_] {:x (rand-int width)
 :y (rand-int height)
 :vx (rand* -0.01 0.01)
 :vy (rand* -0.01 0.01)})
 (range 10)))]
 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (reset! points
 (mapv
 (fn [{:keys [x y vx vy]}]
 (let [vx (if (or (> (+ x vx) width) (< (+ x vx) 0)) (- vx) vx)
 vy (if (or (> (+ y vy) height) (< (+ y vy) 0)) (- vy) vy)]
 {:x (+ x vx)
 :y (+ y vy)
 :vx vx
 :vy vy}))
 @points))))
 (.. js/d3
 (select "#app")
 (append "svg")
 (attr "width" width)
 (attr "height" height)
 (append "g")
 (selectAll ".point")
 (data (js> @points))
 enter
 (append "circle")
 (attr "r" 10)
 (attr "cx" #(.-cx %))
 (attr "cy" #(.-cy %))))" "(ns d3.moving-voronoi
 (:require-macros [d3.utils :refer [attrs> styles>]])
 (:require cljsjs.d3
 [d3.utils :as u]))" "(println u/timer)" "(defn rand* [a b]
 (+ (rand (- b a)) a))" "(let [width 400
 height 400
 points (atom (mapv (fn [_] {:x (rand-int width)

 :vx (rand* -0.01 0.01)

 vy (if (or (> (+ y vy) height) (< (+ y vy) 0)) (- vy) vy)]
 {:x (+ x vx)
 :y (+ y vy)
 :vx vx
 :vy vy}))
 @points))))

 pts (.. js/d3
 (select "#app")
 (append "svg")
 (attr "width" width)
 (attr "height" height)
 (append "g")
 (selectAll ".point")
 (data (clj->js @points))
 (enter)
 (append "circle")
 (attr "r" 10)
 (attr "cx" #(.-x %))
 (attr "cy" #(.-y %)))]
 
 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (let [ps @points] 
 (.. pts 
 (attr "cx" #(:x (get ps %1)))
 (attr "cy" #(:y (get ps %1))))))))" "(let [width 400
 height 400
 points (atom (mapv (fn [_] {:x (rand-int width)
 :y (rand-int height)
 :vx (rand* -0.3 0.3)
 :vy (rand* -0.3 0.3)})
 (range 40)))

 vor-obj (.clipExtent
 (u/voronoi)
 (clj->js [[(/ (- width) 2) (/ (- height) 2)]
 [(/ (+ width) 2) (/ (+ height) 2)]]))

 _ (u/timer (fn [_]
 (reset! points
 (mapv
 (fn [{:keys [x y vx vy]}]
 (let [vx (if (or (> (+ x vx) width) (< (+ x vx) 0)) (- vx) vx)
 vy (if (or (> (+ y vy) height) (< (+ y vy) 0)) (- vy) vy)]
 {:x (+ x vx)
 :y (+ y vy)
 :vx vx
 :vy vy}))
 @points))
 false))

 pts (.. js/d3
 (select "#app")
 (append "svg")
 (attr "width" width)
 (attr "height" height)
 (append "g")
 (selectAll "path")
 (data (clj->js @points))
 (enter)
 (append "path"))

 line (.. js/d3 -svg line (interpolate "basis-closed"))

 three-polate (fn [[[x0 y0] [x1 y1]]]
 [[x0 y0]
 [(/ (+ (* 2 x0) x1) 3), (/ (+ (* 2 y0) y1) 3)]
 [(/ (+ (* 2 x1) x0) 3), (/ (+ (* 2 y1) y0) 3)]])

 resample (fn [pts]
 (let [pairs (map vector (cons (last pts) pts) pts)]
 (mapcat three-polate pairs)))]

 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (let [ps @points
 vnoi (vor-obj (clj->js (mapv (juxt :x :y) ps)))]
 (-> pts (.attr "d" (fn [pt i] (line (clj->js (resample (nth vnoi i)))))))
 false))))" "(defn moving-circles [{:keys [width height radius n speed]}]
 (let [points (atom (mapv (fn [_] {:x (rand-int width)
 :y (rand-int height)
 :vx (->num speed)
 :vy (->num speed)
 :rad (->num radius)})
 (range (->num n))))
 _ (u/timer (fn [_]
 (reset! points
 (mapv
 (fn [{:keys [x y vx vy rad]}]
 (let [vx (if (or (> (+ x vx) (- width rad)) (< (+ x vx) rad)) (- vx) vx)
 vy (if (or (> (+ y vy) (- height rad)) (< (+ y vy) rad)) (- vy) vy)]
 {:x (+ x vx)
 :y (+ y vy)
 :vx vx
 :vy vy
 :rad rad}))
 @points))
 false))
 pts (.. js/d3
 (select "#app")
 (append "svg")
 (attr "width" width)
 (attr "height" height)
 (append "g")
 (selectAll "circle")
 (data (clj->js @points))
 (enter)
 (append "circle")
 (attr "r" #(.-rad %))
 (attr "cx" #(.-x %))
 (attr "cy" #(.-y %)))]

 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (let [ps @points]
 (.. pts
 (attr "cx" #(:x (get ps %2)))
 (attr "cy" #(:y (get ps %2))))
 false)))))" "(moving-circles
 {:width 500
 :height 500
 :radius [10 20]
 :n [10 20]
 :speed [-0.2 0.2]})" "(moving-circles
 {:width 500
 :height 500
 :radius [10 30]
 :n [10 20]
 :speed [-0.5 0.5]})" "(ns d3.moving-voronoi
 (:require-macros [d3.utils :refer [attrs> styles>]])
 (:require cljsjs.d3
 [d3.utils :as u]
 [d3.prob :as p]
 [d3.palettes :as palettes]
 [d3.multis :refer [draw animate]]))" "(ex1)" "(defn ex3 []
 (let [cs (.. js/d3.scale linear (domain #js [0 10]) (range #js ["tomato" "#FAFAFA"]))]
 (rvoronoi {:width 800
 :height 800
 :selector "#app"
 :data (flower {:x 0
 :y 0
 :depth 10
 :r 600
 :petals [3 21]
 :speed [-0.01 0.01]})
 :default-style (styles> {:stroke "white" :stroke-width "2px" :fill #(cs (rand* 0 6))})})))" "(ex3)" "(ex4)" "(let [ramp (-> u/scale
 (.linear)
 (.domain #js [0 10])
 (.range #js ["blue" "red"]))]
 [(ramp 10) (ramp 5) (.invert ramp 0)])" "(let [ramp (-> u/scale
 (.linear)
 (.domain #js [0 10])
 (.range #js ["blue" "red"]))]
 [(ramp 10) (ramp 5) ((.invert ramp) 2)])" "(let [ramp (-> u/scale
 (.linear)
 (.domain #js [0 10])
 (.range #js ["blue" "red"]))]
 [(ramp 10) (ramp 5) (.invert ramp 2)])" "(let [ramp (-> u/scale
 (.linear)
 (.domain #js [0 10])
 (.range #js ["blue" "red"]))]
 [(ramp 10) (ramp 5) (.invert ramp "blue")])" "(let [ramp (-> u/scale
 (.linear)
 (.domain #js [0 10])
 (.range #js ["blue" "red"]))]
 [(ramp 10) (ramp 5) (.invert ramp "#800080")])" "(>> (svg)
 [:selectAll "circle"]
 [:data [scatter-data]]
 [:enter]
 [:append "circle"]
 (u/attrs {:r 5 :cx #(* 10 %2) :cy #(.-friends %1)}))" "(js> scatter-data)" "(let [x-extent (js/d3.extent (js> scatter-data) #(.-salary %))
 y-extent (js/d3.extent (js> scatter-data) #(.-friends %))
 xsc (.. u/scale linear (domain x-extent) (range #js [0 500]))
 ysc (.. u/scale linear (domain y-extent) (range #js [0 500]))
 x-axis (.. js/d3 -svg axis (scale xsc) (orient "bottom") (ticks 4) (tickSize 500))
 y-axis (.. js/d3 -svg axis (scale ysc) (orient "right") (ticks 16) (tickSize 500))
 svg (svg 600 600)]
 (>> svg
 [:selectAll "circle"]
 [:data [scatter-data]]
 [:enter]
 [:append "circle"]
 (u/attrs {:r 5 :cx #(xsc (.-salary %)) :cy #(ysc (.-friends %))}))

 (>> svg
 [:append "g"]
 [:attr ["id" "yAxisG"]]
 [:call y-axis])

 (>> svg
 [:append "g"]
 [:attr ["id" "xAxisG"]]
 [:call x-axis])

 (*> [:selectAll "path.domain"] (u/styles {:fill "none" :stroke "black"}))
 (*> [:selectAll "line"] (u/styles {:stroke "black"})))" "(let [pie-chart (.sort (.pie u/layout) nil)
 p1 (pie-chart (js> data))
 p2 (pie-chart (js> (vec (shuffle data))))
 new-arc (.. (u/arc) (outerRadius "100") (innerRadius "70"))
 color-scale (.. u/scale linear (domain (js> (bounds data))) (range #js ["blue" "red"]))
 svg (svg)]
 (>> svg
 [:append "g"]
 [:attr ["transform" "translate(250,250)"]]
 [:selectAll "path"]
 [:data p1]
 [:enter]
 [:append "path"]
 [:attr ["d" new-arc]]
 (u/styles {:fill (fn [d] (color-scale (.-data d)))
 :opacity "0.5"
 :stroke "black"
 :stroke-width "2px"}))
 (>> svg
 [:selectAll "path"]
 [:data p2]
 [:transition]
 [:delay 1000]
 [:duration 1000]
 [:attr ["d" new-arc]]
 [:style ["fill" (fn [d] (color-scale (.-data d)))]]))" "(pie [2 2 6 7])" "(defn pie
 "incomplete transition are bad"
 [data]
 (let [pie-chart (.sort (.pie u/layout) "null")
 p1 (pie-chart (js> data))
 p2 (pie-chart (js> (vec (shuffle data))))
 new-arc (.. (u/arc) (outerRadius "100") (innerRadius "70"))
 color-scale (.. u/scale linear (domain (js> (bounds data))) (range #js ["blue" "red"]))
 svg (svg)]
 (>> svg
 [:append "g"]
 [:attr ["transform" "translate(250,250)"]]
 [:selectAll "path"]
 [:data p1]
 [:enter]
 [:append "path"]
 [:attr ["d" new-arc]]
 (u/styles {:fill (fn [d] (color-scale (.-data d)))
 :opacity "0.5"
 :stroke "black"
 :stroke-width "2px"}))
 (>> svg
 [:selectAll "path"]
 [:data p2]
 [:transition]
 [:delay 1000]
 [:duration 1000]
 [:attr ["d" new-arc]]
 [:style ["fill" (fn [d] (color-scale (.-data d)))]])))" "(defn bounds [num-coll]
 [(apply min num-coll) (apply max num-coll)])" "(defn pie

 new-arc (.. (u/arc) (outerRadius "100") (innerRadius "70"))
 color-scale (.. u/scale linear (domain (js> (bounds data))) (range #js ["blue" "red"]))
 svg (svg)]

 arcTween (fn [a] 
 (this-as this 
 (let [i (js/d3.interpolate (.-_curent this) a)]
 (aset this "_current" (aget i 0))
 (fn [t] (js/newArc (aget i t))))))

 "The boy with fair hair lowered himself down the last few feet of rock and began to pick his way toward the lagoon.",

 "It was inevitable: the scent of bitter almonds always reminded him of the fate of unrequited love."]
 wgen #(mapv (fn [t] {:text t

 wc (wc2 {:selector "#app"

 (js/setInterval #(wc (wgen)) 2000))" "(get-json "data/tweets.json"

 {:color-scale (.. u/scale
 linear

 (let [svg (*> [:select selector]
 [:append "svg"]
 (u/attrs {:width width :height height})
 [:append "g"])
 path (>> svg [:selectAll "path"])
 voronoi (.clipExtent (js/d3.geom.voronoi) (js> [[0 0] [width height]]))
 points (repeatedly n-polygon (fn [] [(rand-int width) (rand-int height)]))
 paths-data (mapv (fn [d] (println [d (when d (str "M" (.join d "L") "Z"))])

 (voronoi (js> points)))
 path (>> path
 [:data [(js> paths-data)]])]

 (>> path
 [:enter]
 [:append "path"]

 (.clipExtent
 (u/voronoi)
 (clj->js [[0 0]
 [width height]])))" "(defn svg [parent-selector [width height]]
 (.. js/d3
 (select parent-selector)
 (append "svg")
 (attr "width" width)
 (attr "height" (or height width))))" "(defn moving-particles [{:keys [width height n speed radius]}]
 (let [max-rad (if (number? radius) radius (apply max radius))
 points (atom (mapv (fn [_] {:x (p/realize (p/>i> max-rad (- width max-rad)))
 :y (p/realize (p/>i> max-rad (- height max-rad)))
 :vx (p/realize speed)
 :vy (p/realize speed)
 :rad (p/realize radius)})
 (range (p/realize n))))
 _ (u/timer (fn [_]
 (reset! points
 (mapv
 (fn [{:keys [x y vx vy rad]}]
 (let [vx (if (or (> (+ x vx) (- width rad)) (< (+ x vx) rad)) (- vx) vx)
 vy (if (or (> (+ y vy) (- height rad)) (< (+ y vy) rad)) (- vy) vy)]
 {:x (+ x vx)
 :y (+ y vy)
 :vx vx
 :vy vy
 :rad rad}))
 @points))
 false))]
 points))" "(moving-particles

 (enter)
 (append "circle")
 (attr "r" #(.-rad %))
 (attr "cx" #(.-x %))
 (attr "cy" #(.-y %)))]

 (u/timer (fn [_]

 false)))))" "(moving-circles

 (let [points (moving-particles (assoc opts :radius 1))
 color (p/one-of (or palette (val (first (shuffle (seq (:top @palettes/color-lovers)))))))
 vor-obj (voronoi width height)

 pts (.. (svg selector [width height])
 (append "g")
 (selectAll "path")
 (data (clj->js @points))
 (enter)
 (append "path")
 (style "fill" #(p/realize color)))


 line (.. js/d3 -svg line (interpolate "basis-closed"))

 three-polate (fn [[[x0 y0] [x1 y1]]]
 [[x0 y0]
 [(/ (+ (* 2 x0) x1) 3), (/ (+ (* 2 y0) y1) 3)]
 [(/ (+ (* 2 x1) x0) 3), (/ (+ (* 2 y1) y0) 3)]])

 resample (fn [pts]
 (let [pairs (map vector (cons (last pts) pts) pts)]
 (mapcat three-polate pairs)))]

 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (let [ps @points
 vnoi (vor-obj (clj->js (mapv (juxt :x :y) ps)))]
 (-> pts (.attr "d" (fn [pt i] (line (clj->js (resample (nth vnoi i)))))))
 false)))))" "(:top @palettes/color-lovers)" "(cl/top-palettes #(swap! color-lovers assoc :top %))" "(do @color-lovers)" "(top-colors #(println %))" "(new-palettes #(println "new-palettes" %))" "(let [[c1 c2 c3 c4] (shuffle (first (shuffle (vals palettes/wes-anderson))))
 flower {:origin (vec2 150 150)

 (range)
 [[1 30 (styles> {"fill" c1})]
 [6 70 (styles> {"fill" c2})]
 [10 110 (styles> {"fill" c3})]
 [12 150 (styles> {"fill" c4})]])}

 fps (flower-points* flower)
 points (flatten fps)
 vor (voronoi* [300 300] points)

 layers (->> (group-by (comp :id :lr :point) vor)
 sort
 (mapv second))

 rotating-layers (mapv #(rotating-points (:origin flower) (:speed %2) %1)
 fps
 (:lrs flower))

 petals (-> (svg "#app" [300 300])
 (.append "g")
 (.attr "class" "flower")
 (.selectAll ".flower-layer")
 (.data (->array layers))
 (.enter)
 (.append "g")
 (.attr "class" "flower-layer")
 (.selectAll "path")
 (.data ->array)
 (.enter)
 (.append "path")
 (.attr "class" "petal")
 (.attr "d" #(polygon->line (map vec2 (:polygon %))))
 (each* #(-> % :point :lr :styles)))]

 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (let [layers (map deref rotating-layers)
 vor (voronoi* [300 300] (apply concat layers))
 layers (group-by (comp :id :lr :point) vor)]

 (polygon->line

 (u/styles {:fill "blue"})))" "(defn moving-voronoi [{:keys [selector width height radius n speed palette] :as opts}]
 (let [points (moving-particles (assoc opts :radius 1))
 color (p/one-of (or palette (val (first (shuffle (seq (:top @palettes/color-lovers)))))))
 vor-obj (voronoi width height)
 svg (svg selector [width height])

 pts (.. svg
 (append "g")
 (selectAll "path")
 (data (clj->js @points))
 (enter)
 (append "path")
 (style "fill" #(p/realize color)))

 pts2 (.. svg
 (append "g")
 (selectAll "path")
 (data (clj->js @points))
 (enter)
 (append "path")
 (style "fill" #(p/realize color)))


 line (.. js/d3 -svg line (interpolate "basis-closed"))

 three-polate (fn [[[x0 y0] [x1 y1]]]
 [[x0 y0]
 [(/ (+ (* 2 x0) x1) 3), (/ (+ (* 2 y0) y1) 3)]
 [(/ (+ (* 2 x1) x0) 3), (/ (+ (* 2 y1) y0) 3)]])

 resample (fn [pts]
 (let [pairs (map vector (cons (last pts) pts) pts)]
 (mapcat three-polate pairs)))]

 (u/timer (fn [_]
 (let [ps @points
 vnoi (vor-obj (clj->js (mapv (juxt :x :y) ps)))]
 (-> pts
 (.attr "d" (fn [pt i] (line (clj->js (resample (nth vnoi i)))))))
 (-> pts2
 (.attr "d" (fn [pt i] (line (clj->js (resample (nth vnoi i))))))
 (.attr "transform" "scale(0.5 0.5)"))
 false)))))" "(moving-voronoi
 {:selector "#app"
 :width 500
 :height 500
 :speed (p/>f> -1 1)
 :n 100})"], :remote []}}
